required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study Between Dorzagliatin and Empagliflozin
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label, Sequential, Multiple-Dose, Drug-Drug Interaction Study of Dorzagliatin and Empagliflozin in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1, open-label, sequential, multiple-dose, drug interaction study of glucokinase activator dorzagliatin and empagliflozin in subjects with T2DM. Pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics when dorzagliatin and empagliflozin given alone and in combination will be studied.

primary_outcome.description: maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma at steady state over a uniform dosing interval τ
area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma at steady state over a uniform dosing interval τ

arm_group.description: A: Empagliflozin 25 mg QD in the morning on Days 1-5; B: Empagliflozin 25 mg in the morning and Dorzagliatin 75 mg BID (morning and evening) on Days 6-10, with only the morning dose on Day 10; C: Dorzagliatin 75 mg BID (morning and evening) on Days 11-15, with only the morning dose on Day 15.

intervention.description: Empagliflozin as Jardiance® 25 mg film-coated tablets for oral administration
